actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide that the Federal tort claims provision of that title are the exclusive remedy in medical malpractice actions and proceedings resulting from federally authorized National Guard training activities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes the Federal tort claims procedure the exclusive remedy in medical malpractice actions resulting from federally authorized National Guard training activities (repeals the current provision covering such liability).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide that the Federal tort claims provision of that title are the exclusive remedy in medical malpractice actions and proceedings resulting from federally authorized National Guard training activities, and for other purposes.
